title: Batman by Grant Morrison (MiracleScans Ltd)
description:
Batman by Grant Morrison is a new digital collection of Morrison's 70+-issue run on various Batman titles in three easy-to-read volumes.

This is a completely new digital collection, using brand new, high quality, exclusive digital rips.

These unique digital omnibuses collect the Morrison Batman run in 1800+ pages split into three volumes, including:

- Batman 655-658, 663-669, 672-681, & 700-702
- Final Crisis 1-7
- Batman & Robin 1-16
- Batman: The Return of Bruce Wayne 1-6
- Batman Incorporated Vol. 1 1-8
- Batman Incorporated Vol. 2 1-10, 12-13
- Batman: The Return
- Batman Incorporated: Leviathan Strikes

...presented in the most ideal chronological reading order. Other extras include:

- Pinup and other full page art
- Several articles and interviews with Grant Morrison
- Sketch and concept art gallery
- Variant cover gallery
- For other notes and more information about this release (including exclusions), please see the included readme.

If you like what you read here, please support the artists and publisher and ensure further works like this by going out and purchasing the back issues from your local retailer, the trade paperbacks or hardcovers, or the digital comics.

This collection follows these available MiracleScans releases:

- The Complete Alias by Brian Michael Bendis
- The Complete Fantastic Four by Jonathan Hickman (2 volumes)
- The Complete Fantastic Four by Mark Millar
- The Complete Seven Soldiers of Victory by Grant Morrison
- The Complete Miracleman by Alan Moore
- The Complete Marvelman in Warrior

All of these releases can be found on Pirate Bay under username "MrclScns".

MiracleScans specializes in digital omnibus volumes of complex comic runs organized for easy reading, & we also do new scans of older material. Follow on Twitter for news on future releases as there are a number of few cool projects in the pipeline -- @miraclescans
